attributes.action: Reverse the decision to scrap FA Cup replays
attributes.additional_details: fA Cup replays are absolutely crucial to both EFL and non-league football clubs. The decision, made without their knowledge threatens the very existence of community assests
attributes.background: Reverse the decision made on 18th April by the FA and Premier League to scrap FA Cup replays

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about arrangements for football matches and tournaments are a matter for the football authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
